resources.string: Kunne ikke hente en liste over støttede enheter

Det er ingen offisiell informasjon om de nye funksjonene denne oppdateringen gir. Vanligvis gir en slik oppdatering feilrettinger, ytelsesforbedringer og / eller kritiske sikkerhetsoppdateringer for enheten din.

Siden det oppsto en nedlastingsfeil, og nedlastingen må startes på nytt, kan du bruke denne lenken til å laste ned oppdateringsfilen fra en nettleser i stedet. Det kan hende du må flytte den nedlastede filen fra katalogen \"Nedlastinger\" til den overordnede katalogen. Dette er den samme koblingen appen bruker for å laste ned, som er en offisiell OnePlus OTA-serverkobling:\n%1$s
Kunne ikke hente den siste oppdateringsdatainformasjonen
Trykk her for å se viktige merknader
Siden du har aktivert avansert modus, kan du laste ned den nyeste ZIP for \"%1$s\".\n\nDu kan slå avansert modus av fra innstillinger

Du ser på et endringslogg for den siste oppdateringen i oppdateringssporet \"%1$s\" Hvis du har tenkt å installere denne oppdateringen, må du aktivere avansert modus på første (i innstillingene). \n\nMen, hvis du ønsker å se endringsloggen for den installerte versjonen i stedet, du \ 'll trenger å bytte tilbake til riktig oppdateringsmetode.
Serveren kan ikke nås. Prøv å oppdatere siden.
Noen funksjoner fungerer kanskje ikke ordentlig.
Det er en app oppdatering tilgjengelig (%1$s). Trykk her for å åpne Play Butikk og oppdater appen.
Det er en app oppdatering tilgjengelig (%1$s). Å holde appen oppdatert sikrer at du alltid får de nyeste funksjonene og feilrettinger. \nTrykk her for å åpne Play Butikk og oppdater appen.
App oppdateringen kunne ikke installeres. Trykk her for å åpne Play Butikk og oppdatere appen.
Satt på pause - trykk for å fortsette
Den nedlastede oppdateringsfilen er skadet! Prøv å laste ned den igjen.
Det oppsto en serverfeil under nedlasting av oppdateringen. Prøv å laste ned oppdateringen igjen.
Dessverre skjedde det en teknisk feil under nedlasting av oppdateringen. Prøv å laste den ned igjen. Hvis dette fortsetter å skje, kan du kontakte utvikleren av denne appen for å få hjelp.

Det ser ut til at nedlastingslenken er ugyldig. Dette kan enten bety at vi gjorde en feil mens vi la til oppdateringsdata, eller at OnePlus har trukket eller fjernet oppdateringsfilen fra serverne deres. Det er sendt en melding til teamet, og vi vil undersøke denne ASAP. Hvis du ønsker å vite mer, ta gjerne kontakt med oss enten via e-posteller på vår Discord server.
Filen er lastet ned, men kan ikke flyttes til riktig katalog. Åpne en filbehandling, naviger til \"%1$s\" og flytt filen manuelt til den øverste katalogen med intern lagring
Det er ikke nok lagringsplass tilgjengelig på enheten din for å laste ned oppdateringen. Fjern noen filer og prøv å laste dem ned igjen.
Serverfeil under nedlasting. Start nedlastingen på nytt.
Teknisk feil under nedlasting. Start nedlastingen på nytt eller kontakt support.
Fil verifisering mislyktes. Sjekk tilkoblingen din og prøv igjen.
Tema med hvit bakgrunn og OnePlus Red primærfarge
Dempet OnePlus Red primærfarge, med nesten svart bakgrunn. Bruk dette temaet til å spare batteri, spesielt på AMOLED-skjermer
Bruk systemets nattmodus (du kan angi dette enten i skjerminnstillinger eller i utvikleralternativer). Varierer etter enhet
Bytt mellom lyse og mørke temaer basert på tidspunktet på dagen, for å forhindre belastning av øynene om natten
Merk: Hvis \"Auto\" -temaet er aktivt og batterisparing er aktivert, blir mørke temaer automatisk brukt uansett tidspunkt på dagen til å spare batteri
Feil ved lagring av innstillingene. Gå tilbake og velg din enhet / oppdateringsmetode igjen.

En inkrementell oppdatering kan installeres fra hvilken som helst versjon (bortsett fra hvis du har en ulåst oppstartslaster; du bør alltid velge full oppdatering som oppdateringsmetode). \n\n En betaoppdatering av OxygenOS kan alltid installeres, også når du er på en stabil versjon. For å bytte fra stabil til beta, må du aktivere den avanserte modusen i innstillingene. For betas fungerer de fulle og trinnvise oppdateringsmetodene på samme måte som på stabile versjoner.
Innstillingene dine lagres fremdeles. Hvis dette tar for lang tid: Kontroller nettverkstilkoblingen din, avslutt appen og start den på nytt.

Avansert modus skjuler meldingen "Systemet ditt er oppdatert", slik at du kan laste ned og installere alle oppdateringer, selv om de kanskje ikke er kompatible med enheten din. 
\ nDette kan være nyttig når: 
- Oppdatering fra en vanlig versjon til en betaversjon 
- Gjenoppretter fra en betaversjon til den vanlige versjonen (ikke glem å tilbakestille enheten til fabrikken) 
- Installere den nåværende systemversjonen på nytt.
Du trenger en fungerende tilkobling for å se FAQ-siden.

Denne appen lar deg få raskere tilgang til:

• de siste Android-oppdateringene for din OxygenOS-drevne enhet 

• Oppdater enkelt en forankret enhet 

• Se hva som er nytt i systemprogramvaren du bruker for øyeblikket 

• Les de siste nyhetene om OnePlus og OxygenOS

Sveip til venstre for å fortsette.

Dette er ikke en offisiell OnePlus-applikasjon. Bruk av denne appen er helt på egen risiko. Verken OnePlus eller utvikleren av appen er ansvarlig for handlingene dine, inkludert skader forårsaket av bruk av denne appen.\n\nGjennom å bruke denne appen, godtar du vilkårene og betingelsene som nevnt ovenfor.
Enheten er vanligvis allerede valgt ovenfor. Hvis ikke, velg enheten ovenfor.

Vanligvis er den inkrementelle oppdateringen det riktige valget her, fordi den tilbyr mye raskere og mindre nedlastinger.

Men den er ikke kompatibel med forankrede enheter. Hvis du har en forankret enhet, velger du Full oppdatering.

Hvis du har en beta-versjon av OxygenOS, velger du (en av) Open Beta-oppdateringsmetoden (e).
Du er klar til å dra!
Gled deg over å bruke denne appen!\n\nDu kan alltid endre innstillingene senere. For å gjøre det: Trykk på de tre prikkene i øverste høyre hjørne, og trykk på \"Innstillinger\".
Checking if your device is rooted…
Please allow root access when asked.
Unfortunately, you can\'t go back now
Backing up your device. This will take a while!
Thank you for using Oxygen Updater. If you like this app, please rate it 5 stars at Google Play :-)
"Failed to prepare the installation of the update. Did you allow root access?"
You may customize the installation process by changing the options shown below. Tap on \"Start installation\" to start the installation of the update.
Select the root package to install…
Backup my device:\nWhen you select this option, a backup of your system, apps and settings will be made prior to the installation. Always handy to have, in case something goes horribly wrong.

Keep my device rooted:\nWhen you select this option, you may specify a root package which will be installed after the update is installed. This ensures that your device stays rooted. Please note that this root package must be compatible with the NEW OxygenOS version you are going to install!

Wipe the cache partition:\nWhen you select this option, the cache partition will be wiped after the update has been installed. This ensures your device performs optimally and also reduces the likelihood of experiencing bugs caused by the installation of the update.

Reboot after installation:\nWhen you select this option, your device will automatically reboot back to OxygenOS after the update is installed. Otherwise, your device will stay in Recovery Mode, where you can install additional packages.
How do you want to install this update?

The easiest way to install the update.
Your device will restart to install the update.

* Requires root access and TWRP recovery.
Read the install guide to learn how to install the update. You will install the update using the Recovery Mode of your device.
A temporary error occurred while preparing the installation of the update. Please try it again.
Error when installing the update. No changes were made to the software of your device. Try installing the update again.
Failed to check if the update was installed successfully. Please open Oxygen Updater to see if the update was installed successfully.
A different version of OxygenOS was installed. Don\'t select an OxygenOS update file when choosing a root package under the \"Keep my device rooted\" option.
OxygenOS version %1$s has been installed successfully.
You may only select a zip file. Please select the right file.
Install the update according to the instructions shown in the install guide.
Automatic installations have been temporarily disabled due to reported technical issues. Install the update according to the instructions shown in the install guide.
• It\'s recommended to write all steps down, as you\'ll need to power off your device during the installation of the update.

• Press the Download button to start downloading the update.

• The download progress will appear in the app, and as a notification in your notifications screen.

• When the download has finished, you'll see a notification with the text "Download complete".
If a download error occurred, open the app and try to downloading the update again. If this doesn't work, make sure you have a working connection. Otherwise, contact the developer of the app. You can do this by visiting the "My apps" section of the Google Play Store.

"Note: The installation of the update takes place from a special page of the standard System Updates section of your device. If, for some reason, a system update appears when opening this section, you may also opt to install that update first. Afterwards, open Oxygen Updater again to see if you're completely up-to-date.
Instructions: • Close Oxygen Updater by pressing the home button.
• Open the Settings app. It should be located in your app drawer.
• Scroll down until you see System updates. Tap on it."

"Now that you're in the System Updates app, it's time to install the update.
• Within the System Updates section, tap the gear icon in the top right
• Now, select \"Local upgrade\". A file selection screen should appear.
• In this screen, tap on the update file you downloaded using Oxygen Updater. Its name should start with \"%1$sOxygen\".
• Tap on \"Upgrade Now\". The installation should start automatically."

"• The phone will now install the update and displays a progress bar. Please wait until the installation has finished. Installation may take anywhere from a few minutes up to 15 minutes.
• Afterwards, your phone will restart to complete the update."
Done. Enjoy the new OxygenOS version!

• After your device has finished optimizing its apps, the update has been successfully installed.
To verify this, you can check the current version of your system as following:

• Go to Settings, tap on "About Phone", and check the OxygenOS Version.

• If you like this app, give it 5 stars at Google Play!
The root package file you specified no longer exists. Please select a new root package above.
"If you want to keep your device rooted, you'll have to specify a root package above."
Your device isn\'t supported, as it\'s a carrier-exclusive device
We haven\'t added support for your new device yet
Your device isn\'t supported, as it\'s not running OxygenOS
The ultimate tool for OxygenOS updates.

This app was originally developed by Arjan Vlek as a follow-up of another one of his apps, called Cyanogen Update Tracker (it provides similar functionality for Cyanogen OS users).

After 4 years, in July 2019, Arjan decided to step down from both projects and transferred ownership of the app to a team of developers hailing from different countries. They took on the responsibility of providing the community with excellent service & support of getting OnePlus updates faster.
You can find more information about the announcement here.

14th August 2019 marked the first release under new ownership, which came with new features like dark mode and a complete redesign.

For more information on the team, check the website.

Please note, this is not an official OnePlus application.
The OnePlus name, the OnePlus Logo and OxygenOS are property of OnePlus.
Android, Google, Google Play and the Google Play logo are registered trademarks of Google Inc.
This app uses data from OnePlus and its parent company Oppo to show update information.
The %1$s is now supported. Open the app to choose this device.
Install or update Google Play services to enable push notifications.
Displays all important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. These include system update notifications and breaking news notifications.
Displays all non-important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. Contains the status indicators shown during downloading.

Welcome to the help section of Oxygen Updater.

Help covers the following topics:

• Updating your device
• Reading the latest news
• Viewing device information
• Changing settings

Scroll down to browse through the topics.

When opening the app, you'll see if a system update is available. If an update is available, you can install it.

To start the installation, tap the "Download" button (below the update description) to start the download. When the download has finished, the installation screen pops up. If you left the app or the screen didn't pop up, tap the "Install" button, which is now shown next to the "Download" button.

The install screen will first check if you have a rooted device. If you have a rooted device, grant root permission when asked and choose how you want to install the update. Otherwise, follow the instructions for Manual install.

Automatic install:
You'll only have to choose your install options. The default settings are recommended, except that you have to specify the root package which needs to be (re)installed. Select a root package (zip file) using the blue folder button and tap on "Start install" to start the installation.

Manual install:
You'll see an installation guide on your screen. Write the instructions down and perform them as stated to install the update.
News is displayed to the left of the Update screen. The most recent items appear on top. Just tap on an item to read it.\nTap the back arrow or press your back key to return to the news items screen.

You may view some of the specifications of your device using the screen to the right of the Update screen. This comes in handy when making a support request, during which you might be asked for some of the specifications of your device.

You can change your settings by tapping the three dots in the top right, following a tap on Settings.
You can change the following settings:

• Device and update method
• Push notifications
• In app notifications
• Privacy settings (log uploading).

Use the switches to turn notification / privacy settings on and off. Select a device and / or update method using the dropdown menus shown above the switches. Dropdown menus not visible? Check your Internet connection and open the Settings screen again.
Failed to open article. Check your connection and press the \"RETRY\" button to open the article.
Failed to open article from an invalid URL: %1$s. Check the URL or report this to us either via email or on our Discord server.
You have %1$d unread news articles. Tap here to view them.
You have %1$d unread news articles. Tap to show all articles.
There aren\'t any articles available at this moment, check back later.

You've read all articles. Good job!
We hope you enjoyed reading our articles, and learnt something new from them.

Tap the banner again to show all news articles.

Oxygen Updater needs your help! In order to give you the latest updates, we need to get the names of update files. These are present on your phone when a regular update pops up.

How can I help?

Oxygen Updater can automatically submit new update file names to our admins. This will use a small amount of data and may use a bit of your battery. All you need to do is waiting (approximately 15 minutes) before installing official System Updates until you see a confirmation of Oxygen Updater that the file has been successfully submitted. Only the ".Ota" directory on your phone gets scanned once per 15 minutes. It only checks for a specific name in that particular folder.
I\'d like to help and agree to submit update file names to our admins
I\'d like to help improving the app and agree to submit update file names to our admins
Please grant the storage permissions in order to help improving the app
Thanks for sharing update filenames with us!
This version of the app is outdated. It\'s time to update it! Tap on \"Google Play\" below. Within Google Play, tap on \"Update\".
Failed to connect to the server. Please make sure you have a working connection. The app will now close.
Please wait. The server will be available very soon.
The server may be down for maintenance. Try again after some time, or report it to us either via email or on our Discord server.
You can\'t rate the app, because the Google Play Store is missing on your device.

You\'ve already downloaded this update, but haven\'t installed it yet. Tap on \"Install\" to view instructions on how to install this update. Tap on \"Delete\" to permanently delete the downloaded file. Press the back button, or tap outside to close this message.

It looks like you\'re using a carrier-exclusive device. Even though you\'re running OxygenOS, you won\'t be able to install updates. Carriers usually lock down the device so that users can\'t update or modify the firmware without permission from the carrier itself. This is a common practice in the USA: the \"Local Upgrade\" option is removed from carrier-exclusive versions of OxygenOS. This option is necessary to install updates by yourself, even if you don\'t use this app. Unfortunately, we can\'t do anything about this, as we\'re technically, and possibly, legally limited. Reach out to us via email or Discord for more clarity.

Congratulations on your new OnePlus device! Unfortunately, we haven\'t added support for this device yet. Don\'t worry though, we\'ll add it as soon as we can. We don\'t like making mistakes, and it\'s a time-consuming process to verify and test support for new devices, so please be patient. Email us or join our Discord server if you\'d like to help us, or to get notified when we release a new version of the app that includes support for your device.

It looks like your device is not running OxygenOS. Please note that you can only install system updates on devices running OxygenOS.\n\nOther devices, including OnePlus devices running Custom ROMs, are not supported.

Oxygen Updater offers easy, automated update installations for users with a rooted devices. However, incremental updates are not available for rooted devices. Oxygen Updater can check if you have root access to only offer appropriate update methods.

If you have root access, allow Oxygen Updater to obtain root access after closing this message.

No root access? Press "Close" and continue using the app.
Your purchase is in the \"payment pending\" state. Once payment is completed, you\'ll be granted all benefits that you\'re entitled to.
The purchase of the ad-free version failed, because an internal error occurred. Please try again in a few minutes. If you have already paid, please contact Google Play support for assistance.
